column4: is there anything for setting up Beowulf clusters in ubuntu? considering playing around with some of the dells that have bad primary IDE controllers
they need to have boot proms in the NICs, but I assume you already knew this
I can do live-CD, as well, and they do support network booting.
then you need to read up on PXE booting, setting up a tftp server and get them to boot.  After that read up and set up the cluster
